label: A new & accurate map of Asia : drawn from actual surveys, and otherwise collected from journals ; assisted by the most approved modern maps & charts. the whole being regulated by astron. observations

metadata.label: Contact Information
metadata.value: University of Minnesota Libraries, John R. Borchert Map Library. S-76 Wilson Library, 309 19th Ave S, Minneapolis, MN 55455; https://www.lib.umn.edu/borchert

metadata.label: Contributing Organization
metadata.value: University of Minnesota Libraries, John R. Borchert Map Library.

metadata.label: Description
metadata.value: Cartographic Details: Scale [1:26,000,000]. Numbered"N°52." Decorative title cartouche with palm tree. Shows boundaries, rivers, islands and principal settlements. Relief shown pictorially. London meridian.
